trans-unit.source: A Python library for creating LaTeX files and snippets
trans-unit.target: A Python library for creating LaTeX files and snippets

trans-unit.source: PyLaTeX is a Python library for creating and compiling LaTeX files or snippets. The goal of this library is being an easy, but extensible interface between Python and LaTeX.
trans-unit.target: PyLaTeX is a Python library for creating and compiling LaTeX files or snippets. The goal of this library is being an easy, but extensible interface between Python and LaTeX.

trans-unit.source: Read the How to contribute page for tips and rules when you want to contribute.
trans-unit.target: Read the How to contribute page for tips and rules when you want to contribute.
